snippet: A salvage company has a contract to dredge the Patuca River and raise valuable mahogany and cedar logs, but weapons on the company ship mean time in jail.
abstract: Marine salvage expert Robert Mayne and five-man crew of his company Aqua Quest International, arriving in Honduras for project agreed to by municipality of Ahuas, are arrested by Honduran police and jailed on charges of weapons possession; Ahuas officials are fighting the arrests and a court in La Ceiba is considering group's appeal of what they contend is unlawful detention.
lead_paragraph: A salvage company has a contract to dredge the Patuca River and raise valuable mahogany and cedar logs, but weapons on the company ship mean time in jail.

headline.main: U.S. Crew Is Arrested on Honduras River Job
headline.print_headline: U.S. Crew Is Arrested on Honduras River Job
